body_html: As the paper says, we already have a version to check in. It's only slightly more complicated because you want to avoid keeping two activation buffers worth of memory for backprop by recomputing it in the backward pass. I'll make sure @PrajitR gets his change in soon ;)

body: As the paper says, we already have a version to check in.  It's only slightly more complicated because you want to avoid keeping two activation buffers worth of memory for backprop by recomputing it in the backward pass.  I'll make sure @PrajitR gets his change in soon ;)
